result.eng: Our boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.
result.ga: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo
result.orig: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo
result.html: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leoOur boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.
result.ponchtml: D'ullṁaiġ ár ndornálaiṫe go dian cé naċ raiḃ traenálaí ar biṫ leoOur boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.

result.eng: Our life on earth is temporary.
result.ga: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.orig: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.html: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamhOur life on earth is temporary.
result.ponchtml: Is neaṁḃuan ár mbeaṫa ar talaṁOur life on earth is temporary.

result.eng: My wife and our two children.
result.ga: Mo bhean agus ár mbeirt ghasúr
result.orig: Mo bhean agus ár mbeirt ghasúr
result.html: Mo bhean agus ár mbeirt ghasúrMy wife and our two children.
result.ponchtml: Mo ḃean agus ár mbeirt ġasúrMy wife and our two children.

result.eng: She didn't like the look of us.
result.html: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léiShe didn't like the look of us.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫaitin ár ndreaċ léiShe didn't like the look of us.

result.eng: We were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ga: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.orig: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.html: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.

result.eng: We are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.
result.ga: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas Eorpach
result.orig: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas Eorpach
result.html: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas EorpachWe are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.
result.ponchtml: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reaċtúil de ḃua ár mballraíoċta san Aontas EorpaċWe are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.

result.eng: The Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ga: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.orig: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.html: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ponchtml: Rinne na Naitsiṫe ár uafásaċ ar ḟir an ḃaile mar ḋíoltas ar ġníoṁarṫa Ḟriṫḃeartaíoċt na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: We a have a lot ahead of us.
result.ga: Tá lán na lámh os ár gcoinne
result.orig: Tá lán na lámh os ár gcoinne
result.html: Tá lán na lámh os ár gcoinneWe a have a lot ahead of us.
result.ponchtml: Tá lán na láṁ os ár gcoinneWe a have a lot ahead of us.

result.eng: Our ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ga: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí
result.orig: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí
result.html: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach BabaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ponchtml: Tá ár gcluasa boḋraiṫe aige agus gan as a ḃéal aċ BabaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
